title: Keeping the Romance Sizzling in Your Marriage, Part 5
itunes:author: John Fuller & Greg Smalley
itunes:summary:
Having a godly perspective on sex can strengthen the overall health of your marriage. John, Greg and Erin give some thoughts on rekindling the romance with your spouse.

Receive Bill and Pam Farrel's book Red-Hot Monogamy with your gift of any amount!
